newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal's Colep cleared to raise capital.
newsitem.headline: Portugal's Colep cleared to raise capital.

text.p: Portuguese metal packaging business Colep Portugal-Embalagens, Produtos, Enchimentos e Equipamentos has been authorised to raise capital by up to 15 billion escudos, the official Lisbon bourse bulletin said.
"The board is authorised to raise capital by up to 15 billion escudos," it said.
After its flotation on Lisbon bourse in March, Colep raised its capital by 6.5 billion escudos to 11.6 billion.
